Discharge of Home Duties. Be sure to perform your smallest duties in the fear and love of God, with faithfulness 
                                                                           52
and cheerfulness. God declares, "He that is faithful in that which is least is faithful also in much" [Luke 16:10]. Faithfully discharge your home duties, and then leave yourself with God, saying, "I commit the keeping of my soul to Him. I will not take the ordering of my life out of His hands. I will leave myself in His keeping."
